name: Vanessa Braganholo Murta
content: Vanessa Braganholo Vanessa Braganholo Menu: HomePublicationsCoursesStudentsServiceContact Vanessa Braganholo Full Professor (Prof. Titular) - Instituto de Computação Universidade Federal Fluminense, Niterói, RJ, Brazil. Short Bio Vanessa Braganholo is a Full Professor at the Instituto de Computação of Universidade Federal Fluminense (UFF) since 2010. Before that, she worked as an Assistant Professor at Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ). She holds a Ph.D. (2004) and a B.S. (1998) degree in Computer Science from Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS). She received the Best PhD Thesis Award of the Brazilian Computer Society in 2005. She has a productivity research grant level 2 from CNPq since 2007 and had a Young Scientist research grant from FAPERJ from 2010 to 2016. She has published over 100 papers in journals and conferences. She is the PC Co-Chair of EDBT 2026. She has served as PC Chair (CIKM Workshops Chair, SIGMOD Jim Gray Dissertation Award 2022 and 2021, IPAW 2021 and 2020, PVLDB DEMO 2018, SBBD 2018, SIGMOD DEMO 2015) and as a program committee member of several conferences such as VLDB, MSR, ICDE, CIKM, IPAW, SBBD, and TaPP. She serves as the editor of the Distinguished Database Profiles of SIGMOD RECORD since 2011. Her research area is databases, and her current research interests include databases and provenance. Highlights PC Co-Chair of EDBT 2026 Workshop Co-Chair for CIKM 2024 Member of the PVLDB Advisory Board 2021-2025 PC co-chair of the SIGMOD Jim Gray Dissertation Awards 2021 and 2022 PC Chair of the IPAW 2020 and IPAW 2021 PC Co-Chair of the Doctoral Symposium of ER 2019 PC Co-Chair of PVLDB DEMO 2018, with Ming Hua Steering Committee Chair of the Brazilian Symposium on Databases 2016 PC Co-Chair of SIGMOD DEMO 2015, with Juliana Freire PC Chair of the Brazilian Symposium on Databases 2015 Associate Editor of SIGMOD RECORD, responsible for the Distinguished DB Profiles Column, with H. V. Jagadish Associate Editor of the Journal of Information and Data Management (2012-2014) Generated by webgen | Design by Andreas Viklund
